oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Memphis Woman Of 80s Set Pattern For South's Nurses Of Today"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: biographies; clothing; medicine; nursing; Warner, Lena Angevine; women; 1890s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A biographical sketch of Dr. Lena Angevine Warner, a Memphis nursing hero. Warner was active in building the City Hospital, served as executive chief nurse in Cuba during the Spanish-American War, and designed the first official nurse's uniform.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Guthrie, Maude (Miss)
